extends Shape
implements ShapeObservable

    Title: ImageX

    Description: Subclass of a Shape, representing an Image.

      • getPosition

        public java.awt.Point getPosition()

      • beginPixelUpdate

        public void beginPixelUpdate()
        DirectX scene rendering style (Begin()...End()) applied to pixel modification. Call this method before modifying pixels of the image.

      • endPixelUpdate

        public void endPixelUpdate()
        DirectX scene rendering style (begin()...end()) applied to pixel modification. Call this method to finish modifying pixels of the image.

      • setPixel

        public void setPixel(int x,
                     int y,
                     int valueARGB)
        Set an image's pixel ARGB color value with an int. You have to call this between beginPixelUpdate() and endPixelUpdate().
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the pixel.
        y - Y coordinate of the pixel.
        valueARGB - ARGB value of the pixel color.

      • setPixel

        public void setPixel(int x,
                     int y,
                     Pixel pixel)
        Set an image's pixel ARGB color value with an Pixel. You have to call this between beginPixelUpdate() and endPixelUpdate().
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the pixel.
        y - Y coordinate of the pixel.
        pixel - Pixel containing the color value to set

        Parameters:

        y - Y coordinate
        Returns:
        the ARGB color value of the pixel
